name: SUPERBUG - VOLUME 1 - THE METAMORPHOSIS - GRAPHIC NOVEL
description: SUPERBUG - Graphic Novel - 2020 - When a slovenly teenage boy doesn’t listen to his mother’s sensible advice, he turns into a giant cockroach in this delightfully dark comedy homage to Franz Kafka’s novel, The Metamorphosis. Award winning story and screenplay by Gio Forlenza and artwork by FORLENZA. Winner of Los Angeles Film Awards 2020, New York Film Awards 2020, Hollywood Horrorfest 2020, and many more awards for best screenplay. Copyright 2020 All Rights Reserved.
